import React, { Component } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { DataContext } from "./Context" import "./Header.css" import logo from "../logo.png" import cart from "../cart.png" class Header extends Component { static contextType = DataContext render() { const { categories, updateCurrency, currentCurrency } = this.context return (
{categories.map(({ name }) => (
  • {name}
))}
) } } export default Header
